      class  CollectedSearchGroup<T>
      Expert: representation of a group in FirstPassGroupingCollector, tracking the top doc and FieldComparator slot.

      abstract void GroupSelector.setGroups(Collection<SearchGroup<T>> groups)
      Set a restriction on the group values returned by this selector If the selector is positioned on a document whose group value is not contained within this set, then GroupSelector.advanceTo(int) will return GroupSelector.State.SKIP
